parameters: \pop[2]We leave the grocery store, our hands full of bags.

Please don't hate me for this.

\pop[2]I'm a little confused, but I quickly realize what's going on.
\pop[2]Isaac locked his keys in the car. I guess we're stuck.
\pop[3]And you insisted on using this dated piece of junk.

And it's not dated. It's vintage.
\pop[5]You say that, but you'll thank me for having it one day.

\pop[5]Nah. I'm actually gonna walk with you.
\pop[5]I'll have to grab some tools from my workshop.
Thankfully, this isn't the first time I've locked myself out.
\pop[5]Yeah! Always makes a good story to tell.
\pop[3]Why not just get a new car?

\pop[2]With all this added weight, it'd take a couple hours to get back home.
\pop[3]I guess I'm coming over to your place now.
Good thing I didn't have a stream planned today.
\pop[3]Yeah. I'm taking the weekend off for you.
\pop[3]I don't get to do that very often. It's costly.
But in my heart, I know that this open bar is compensation enough.
\pop[3]Oh, I plan on going farther than that.
\pop[3]You wanted to make the night memorable, right?
I think the marker of a memorable night is not remembering it at all.
\pop[3]Says the guy who drinks beer at lunchtime.
\pop[3]Oh, I can't wait to hear the explanation on that one.
\pop[2]Before they can continue talking, we almost bump into somebody.

\pop[3]That's what you do with food, yeah.

\pop[2]We exchange glances, as concern rises within us.
\pop[3]Can't you go buy some food for yourself?
\pop[2]He slaps his hands on his pants pockets, as if looking for something.
\pop[2]A clearly comedic gesture, as we can now tell he's carrying nothing with him.
\pop[4]Guess I forgot my wallet at home.
\pop[2]We exchange glances once again, as we start to understand.
\pop[4]That's what they've been calling me, yeah.
\pop[4]My friends are here to protest. I just wanted to see the city.
Didn't pack enough though, and now this walking has me starved.

So I guess \c[14]you're\c[0] the cool one.

Walking around in a jacket that's three sizes too big.

Anyway, let's keep going. Hopefully that was our only distraction.

Totally normal to be concerned with your weight.

\pop[2]As we make our way home, I can't help but feel sorry for that \c[10]zero\c[0], too.
